thread.title: Justin Bieber sends prayers to Lamar Odom
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber sends prayers to Lamar Odom

author: Wires English | Press Trust of India
title: Justin Bieber sends prayers to Lamar Odom
text:
Comments Los Angeles, Oct 19: Pop sensation Justin Bieber sent his love and admiration to Lamar Odom, who is still on a rocky road to recovery after awaking from his coma. Bieber, 22, took to Instagram with a sweet message for Odom, reported Hollywood Life. ”We all believe in you! Praying for you Lamar,” Bieber captioned his Instagram, a joyous picture of Odom beaming on the basketball court back when he played for the Lakers. (Also Read: Adele is back with new single) The 35-year-old basketball star recently regained consciousness after collapsing at a brothel in Nevada earlier this week and Bieber is the latest star to take to social media to reach out to Odom. Bieber is far from the Odom’s friends and fans from the NBA have sent truckloads of presents to his hospital room. He has received so many cards, balloons and cool presents that it is “beginning to look like Christmas” in his room. Odom’s estranged wife Khloe, 31, has been with him since he was admitted to hospital and has barely left his side. 
  3:15 PM Topics:
